task.summary: Default task
Initial commit.
Initial commit.
Travis mail notification changed.
Dealer sets allin bet at blinds.
GameRound game quality added.
When 1-st round there is question to user and makes bet.
Players can make bets.
Dealer asks players about moves. Some refactorings done. New issues in test file created.
JDK versions added to travis yml file.
binary files removed from vcs
Player can folds.
Tests refactored.
Player can call
CallValue property added to desk
Second player can move with same logic as first.
Minimum rise when rise value is not enough
Spec changed: no fold when small rise
When all players moved - new round comes
Player status call and Fold sets
Deprecated code replaced. Player status rise works.
AllInMoveStatus works
AllInMoveStatus works Test cases changed Refactored
GameRound is enum.
Moves extracted to MoveManager class
More refactor: New game setting extracted to NewGameSetter class. Next player finding and move availability extracted to PlayerManager class.
Initial bet extracted for NewGameSetter
MoveManager refactored
DealerTest class created. When game status CYCLE_ENDED - cycle manager ends game.
PlayerManager refactored.
No movers availability check when gameStatus is INITIAL
No movers availability check when gameStatus is FINAL
EndGameManager ends game when gameRound is FINAL
In PlayersManager defining moving player improved. Fined new issue to test im MoveManager.
Setting CallValue fixed.
CardDeck class codded.
CardDeck class codded. No exception when takes 52 cards.
CardCombination class created and works with 2 card combinations without pairs. Enum cardValue and CardSuit contains names. Card implements Comparable based on values compatibility.
Pairs of two cards can be defined. toString codded.
Flash acn be found. Combination message formation removed to Combinations enum.
Varangs in Combinations.java refactored.
Kickers formation in Combinations changed.
Royal flash, straight flash, flash detection codded.
FullHouse type 3,2 codded.
